dmca.title: DMCA / Breach of Copyright
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: World Guides [mailto:info@world-guides.com] 
Sent: Sunday, February 18, 2007 2:53 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: DMCA / Breach of Copyright

Unfortunately, your client http://www.content-articles.com/ has had  
articles posted by one of its writers which breach the copyright of  
our sites World Guide to Menorca, Sydney, Ibiza, Dublin and Berlin.

We have contacted them directly on several occasions, but have never  
received a response to our correspondence.

Next we contacted your client's webhost Pronet Hosting, http:// 
www.pronethosting.net, but have received no response.

Therefore, as per your Acceptable Use Policy, http:// 
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/Planet%20Acceptable%20Usage% 
20Policy%20AUP%20011507%20FINAL.pdf, we wish to issue the following  
DMCA complaint:

1. MR. MARTIN TREASURE

2.The text copied is as follows:
http://www.content-articles.com/article.aspx?i=10218&t=Travel-in- 
Menorca-Spain
http://www.content-articles.com/article.aspx?i=9777&t=Travel-in- 
Australia
http://www.content-articles.com/article.aspx?i=9775&t=Travel-in-Ibiza- 
Spain
http://www.content-articles.com/article.aspx?i=8369&t=Travel-in- 
Lanzarote-Spain
http://www.content-articles.com/article.aspx?i=7311&t=Travel-in- 
Dublin-Ireland
http://www.content-articles.com/article.aspx?i=6702&t=Travel-in- 
Albufeira-Portugal
http://www.content-articles.com/article.aspx?i=6024&t=Travel-in-Trier- 
Germany

3. The original text can be viewed here:
http://www.berlin.world-guides.com/transportation.html
http://www.ibiza.world-guides.com/travel.html
http://www.dublin.world-guides.com/transportation.html
http://www.sydney.world-guides.com/sydney_travel.html
http://www.menorca.world-guides.com

4.  Contact: Martin Treasure - director TravelSmart Ltd
Tel: +44 1373 454064
Email: info@world-guides.com <mailto:info@world-guides.com
Address: 18 Wayside Close, Frome, Somerset, England BA11 2DL

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner
complained of is not authorized by World Guides.

6. I hereby state under penalty of perjury that this information is
accurate, and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the
infringed materials.

Many thanks for your help, please advise if you require any further  
information.
I look forward to hearing from you shortly.
MARTIN
